elements.name: Name dem Aufgaben
elements.title: Use the tool to assign the two business variants to the state organizations "federal state"/"central state" and the terms "centralized"/"decentralized" by completing the cloze text.

elements.name: Frage 1
elements.title: Variant 1: Is ... organized like a ... .
elements.correctAnswer: Is organized decentrally, like a federal state.

elements.name: Frage 2
elements.title: Variant 2: Is ... organized like a ... .
elements.correctAnswer: Is centrally organized, like a central state.

elements.name: panel1
elements.title: Now derive the disadvantages of the two state organizations from the advantages of the two business models.

elements.name: panel2
elements.title: Take another look at variant 1 of your business model. In pairs, think about how you would have to change it so that it would function completely decentrally (like a confederation of states).

elements.name: Frage 5
elements.title: Write down your proposal and compare it with that of another group and discuss the differences.
elements.correctAnswer: It is not me (the founder of the restaurant), but the restaurant managers who decide among themselves which tasks are assigned to me. This means that I also lose my decision-making authority.
